title: OnePlus Nord 2 vs. OnePlus Nord 2T: What’s new and should you upgrade? [Video]
content:
After the launch of the OnePlus Nord 2 late last year, the Chinese firm is following up with a refreshed and tuned OnePlus Nord 2T. But is there enough of a difference to warrant switching from the OnePlus Nord 2 to the OnePlus Nord 2T?

more…

The post OnePlus Nord 2 vs. OnePlus Nord 2T: What’s new and should you upgrade? [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Is the OnePlus Nord 2T an upgrade over the OnePlus Nord 2? We'll answer all of your questions in this in-depth comparison of the devices.
